title: 2026 Real Estate Opportunity ‘Compelling': Hochfelder
description: Lauren Hochfelder, Head of Global Real Assets at Morgan Stanley, says the firm is seeing compelling opportunities in real estate, adding that its highest-conviction strategy on a risk-reward basis is net lease. She tells Romaine Bostick on “The Close.” (Source: Bloomberg)
